titles.title: CB 428 Praise, Praise Ye the Name of Jehovah Our God

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
c1
verse.lines:
For His love floweth on,
Free and full as a river;
And His mercy endureth
For ever and ever.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise, praise ye the Lamb, who for sinners was
slain;
Who went down to the grave, and ascended
again;
And who soon shall return, when these dark days
are o’er,
To set up His kingdom, in glory and power.

verse.name: v3
v4
verse.lines:
Her bridal attire, and her festal array,
All nature shall wear on that glorious day;
For her King cometh down, with His people to
reign,
And His presence shall bless her with Eden again.
